name: 林含怡
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Unit 1 Words and Pictures/ A Writer’s Journey
Week 3: Unit 1 Words and Pictures/ A life in Pictures
Week 4: Unit 2 Love and Attraction/ Aspects of Love
Week 5: Unit 2 Love and Attraction/ Animal Attraction
Week 6: Unit 3 Food and Health/ Food Safety
Week 7: Unit 3 Food and Health/ Genetic Engineering
Week 8: Review & Midterm Exam
Week 9: Midterm Proficiency Test
Week 10: Unit 4 Design and Engineering/ Design by Nature
Week 11: Unit 4 Design and Engineering/ The Future of Fashion
Week 12: Unit 5 Human Journey/ The DNA Trail
Week 13: Unit 5 Human Journey/ Fantastic Voyage
Week 14: Unit 6 Conservation Challenges/ Disappearing Forests
Week 15: Unit 6 Conservation Challenges/ Animal Protectors
Week 16: Practice & Review
Week 17: Review & Final Exam
Week 18: Final Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 15%
Final exam 20% 
English proficiency exams 15% + 15%
Group presentation 15%
Biweekly personal reflection 10%
Attendance & participation 10%
materials: Maclntyre, P. (2010) Reading Explorer 4. Heinle Cengage Learning.
